title: NBA star Kevin Durant invests in National Cycling League in middle of shaky first season for the crit league
content:
The upstart criterium racing league is backed by many U.S. sports stars, but has had a tumultuous first season marked by canceled and rescheduled races and leadership turnover.

Read the full article at NBA star Kevin Durant invests in National Cycling League in middle of shaky first season for the crit league on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
